name: Grid Rangers
description:
The porcine menace has grown out of control. S.W.I.N.E. have seized the darknet. Using a match-3 tactical combat hacking interface, you must deploy the Grid Rangers to penetrate the S.W.I.N.E. intranet and take their mainframe down from the inside.

Swap tiles to collect resources.

Trade stolen data for ranger upgrades.

Activate ranger abilities for powerful effects.
